numSigsPayer.label: # payer sigs
numSigsPayer.tip: Number of signatures authorizing the transfer of the payment

numSigsTotal.label: # total sigs
numSigsTotal.tip: Total number of signatures on transaction â€“ includes payer signatures and others

numKeys.label: # keys
numKeys.tip: Number of public keys attached to created/updated object

expirationHours.label: Expiration
expirationHours.caption: hours
expirationHours.tip: Storage duration for objects created in state. This parameter is currently fixed to 2160 hours (3 months) while the network is in beta

numAccountsOnTransfer.label: # accounts on transfer
numAccountsOnTransfer.tip: A single transfer can have multiple paying and/or recipient accounts

numLivehashes.label: # livehashes on account
numLivehashes.tip: Hashes of identity claims can be attached to an account

numProxyAccounts.label: # proxy-staking accounts
numProxyAccounts.tip: How many accounts proxy stake to this node account

numThresholdsDefined.label: # thresholds defined
numThresholdsDefined.tip: How many thresholds for record generation does the account have

memoSize.label: memo size
memoSize.caption: bytes
memoSize.tip: How large is any memo specified for the transaction

is25HourRecordCreated.label: 24 hour record created?
is25HourRecordCreated.tip: If a transfer exceeds a sending or receiving threshold, a record will be generated and stored for 24 hours

numEntitiesReturned.label: # entities returned
numEntitiesReturned.tip: How many entities are returned in the response

numRecordsReturned.label: # records returned
numRecordsReturned.tip: How many records are returned in the response

isStateProofRequested.label: State proof requested?
isStateProofRequested.caption: coming soon
isStateProofRequested.tip: For any query, is a state proof requested for the response

contractConstructorCallParamsSize.label: Contract constructor/call params
contractConstructorCallParamsSize.caption: bytes
contractConstructorCallParamsSize.tip: Size of a smart contract constructor/call

contractFunctionReturnSize.label: Contract function return size
contractFunctionReturnSize.caption: bytes
contractFunctionReturnSize.tip: Size of the results of a smart contract operation

gas.label: Gas
gas.tip: How much gas is consumed by the smart contract operation
